biography: Casey Boersma was born on January 13, 1995 (Capricorn) in Los Angeles County, California, USA as Casey James Boersma. He is an actor, known for Drillbit Taylor (2008), The Story of Us (1999) and Father of the Bride Part II (1995). He is the Identical twin brother of Dylan Boersma.
name: Casey Boersma
